code: import axios from"axios";import{Base_url}from"../pages/url";import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatInput=_ref=>{let{user,clickedUser,getUserMessages,getClickedUsersMessages}=_ref;const[testArea,setTextArea]=useState("");const userId=user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.user_id;const clickedUserId=clickedUser===null||clickedUser===void 0?void 0:clickedUser.user_id;const addMessage=async()=>{const message={timestamp:new Date().toISOString(),from_userId:userId,to_userId:clickedUserId,message:testArea};try{await axios.post("".concat(Base_url,"/messages"),{message});getUserMessages();getClickedUsersMessages();setTextArea("");}catch(error){console.log(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:testArea,onChange:e=>setTextArea(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"secondary-button",onClick:addMessage,children:"Submit"})]});};export default ChatInput;
